name: At the strike of midknight
description:
A tower defence game made fro Create jam fall 2020.

Programming: Theodor F. Purcaru

2D, textures and 3D art: Edward Giurgiu

Art direction, 3D art: Austeja Vaicyte

In a land far far away there lived a really cool princess. And she thought pompous knights were sooo not her jam. For one, they were old. And also boring. and probably stinky too. So she had to defeat waves and waves of them trying to invade her tower. She built walls and set up turrets, shooting beams of fire and throwing pots at them. Because who likes getting hit in the head with a pot?
